article.title: Diamondback Century 1 Road Bike (700c Wheels)
article.description: Built for comfort on the roads, the Diamondback® Century 1 bike features all the technology and smooth handling of the Podium series, but with a slightly more upright geometry that puts less strain on your neck and back. The Shimano® drivetrain and FSA® Tempo Triple crankset spins smoothly through the 24 gears, operated with Shimano® dual-control shifters/brakes. Michelin® Dynamic Sport 700c tires deliver a comfortable ride.
